title: Project Realignment Engine
description: Advanced tool for detecting and correcting project status misalignments through comprehensive analysis

steps.description: Collect all project reports, code, and documentation
Deep dive into working features and code complexity
Identify gaps between perceived and actual status
Update completion, timeline, and scope metrics
Create updated project roadmap and priorities

learning_insights: Regular realignment prevents major project miscalculations
Working features indicate higher completion than file creation metrics
Comprehensive analysis improves project visibility and timeline accuracy
Timeline adjustments significantly impact resource planning and delivery
Feature depth analysis reveals true implementation status
Database and API integration maturity affects overall completion assessment

risk_mitigation.assessment_bias: Use multiple analysis methods for validation
risk_mitigation.feature_overestimation: Test actual functionality before claiming completion
risk_mitigation.timeline_compression: Account for testing and integration complexity
